Rename columns of a linelist

Source: R/names.R
names-set-.linelist.Rd

This function can be used to rename the columns a linelist, adjusting tags as needed.

# S3 method for linelist
names(x) <- value

Arguments

x

a linelist object

value

a character vector to set the new names of the columns of x

Value

a linelist with new column names

See also

rename.linelist() for renaming columns as with dplyr::rename()

Author

Thibaut Jombart thibaut@data.org

Examples

if (require(outbreaks)) {

  ## dataset to create a linelist from
  measles_hagelloch_1861

  ## create linelist
  x <- make_linelist(measles_hagelloch_1861,
                     id = "case_ID",
                     date_onset = "date_of_prodrome",
                     age = "age",
                     gender = "gender")
  head(x)

  ## change names
  names(x)[1] <- "case_label"

  ## see results: tags have been updated
  head(x)
  tags(x)
}
#> $id
#> [1] "case_label"
#> 
#> $date_onset
#> [1] "date_of_prodrome"
#> 
#> $gender
#> [1] "gender"
#> 
#> $age
#> [1] "age"
#>
